title: User Authentication Successful Login
description: Verify that users can login successfully with valid credentials and are redirected to /dashboard.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page (/auth).
Enter valid username/email and password.
Click the login button.
Verify user is redirected to /dashboard.

title: User Authentication Failed Login with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login fails and an error message is shown when entering invalid credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page (/auth).
Enter invalid username/email or password.
Click the login button.
Verify that login fails and appropriate error message is displayed.

title: Automatic Profile Creation on First Sign-in
description: Verify that a new profile is automatically created for users signing in for the first time.

steps.description: Sign in with a new user account that has never accessed the system.
Verify that a profile is automatically created and linked to this user.

title: Profile Editing by Owner Only with RLS Enforcement
description: Verify that only the profile owner can edit their profile and RLS prevents unauthorized edits.

steps.description: Log in as user A and navigate to user A's profile edit page.
Update profile fields (e.g., avatar, bio) and save.
Verify that changes are saved successfully.
Log in as user B and attempt to access or edit user A's profile.
Verify that access is denied or changes are prevented due to RLS.

title: Create, Edit, and Delete Goals, Projects, and Tasks
description: Verify users can create, edit, and delete goals, projects, and tasks within the productivity system.

steps.description: Login and navigate to goals management.
Create a new goal with valid input.
Verify the goal appears in the goals list.
Under the goal, create a new project.
Verify the project appears nested under the goal.
Within the project, create a new task with required fields.
Verify the task appears under the project.
Edit the taskâ€™s attributes (name, description, status).
Verify updates are saved and shown.
Delete the task, then the project, then the goal.
Verify each item is properly removed and no orphan data remains.

title: Scheduling Tasks into Time Windows via Drag and Drop
description: Verify users can schedule tasks into time slots (Windows) using drag-and-drop and quick add functionality.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the scheduling screen.
Drag a task from the task list into an available time window.
Verify that the task is scheduled into the selected time window and appears on today's schedule.
Use the quick add feature to schedule a new task into a window.
Verify the task appears in the scheduled window and updates the view accordingly.

title: XP Award and Level Progress on Task Completion
description: Verify completing tasks correctly awards XP to linked skills and updates levels and Monument charge.

steps.description: Create a task linked to specific skills and a Monument.
Mark the task as completed.
Verify XP is awarded to the linked skills.
Verify the user's skill levels update accordingly.
Verify the Monument charge increases appropriately.

title: Top Navigation Avatar Display and Navigation
description: Verify the top navigation bar avatar displays the uploaded user image and that clicking it navigates to the profile page.

steps.description: Login and upload a user avatar image.
Verify the avatar appears correctly in the top navigation bar.
Click on the avatar in the top navigation.
Verify that the user is navigated to their profile page.

title: Redirect Unauthorized Users to /auth on Protected Routes
description: Verify that unauthorized users attempting to access protected routes are redirected to the authentication page (/auth).

steps.description: Attempt to access /dashboard without being authenticated.
Verify user is redirected to /auth login page.

title: Performance Benchmark: Dashboard First Render Time
description: Verify that the dashboard page first render completes under 1.5 seconds on typical devices and network conditions.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the /dashboard page.
Measure and confirm the initial render time is less than 1.5 seconds.

title: Performance Benchmark: Route Transitions Under 400 ms
description: Verify that transitions between main routes (e.g. /dashboard to /profile) complete in under 400 milliseconds.

steps.description: Navigate from /dashboard to /profile, /goals, and /tasks.
Measure and verify the route transitions finish in under 400 ms each.

title: Public Profile Page Optional Sharing
description: Verify the optional public profile page is enabled, can be viewed by others, and displays appropriate user information.

steps.description: Enable public profile sharing in user settings.
Verify a public URL is generated for the profile.
Access the public profile page via generated URL in an incognito window or different user account.
Verify profile information and avatar are visible and no restricted information is leaked.

title: Dynamic Scheduler Suggests Next Best Task
description: Verify the scheduler recommends the most appropriate next task based on user energy, priority, and availability.

steps.description: Create multiple tasks with varying priorities, skill energy levels, and available time slots.
Access the scheduler recommendations.
Verify that the suggested next task matches the highest priority task within user's energy and available slots.

title: Security: Prevent External Redirects on Authentication Callbacks
description: Verify the authentication flow protects against external URL redirects and only allows redirection to approved internal routes.

steps.description: Attempt login with a redirect parameter pointing to an external URL.
Verify the redirect is blocked or sanitized, ensuring user is redirected only within allowed internal routes.

title: Accessibility: Keyboard Navigation and ARIA Labeling
description: Verify that all interactive controls have proper ARIA labels, support keyboard focus states, and are fully navigable via keyboard.

steps.description: Tab through the entire dashboard interface using keyboard only.
Verify that all interactive elements receive focus with visible focus indicators.
Verify that ARIA labels and roles are present on controls such as buttons, links, inputs.

title: Data Integrity: Avatar Storage and Retrieval Security
description: Verify avatars uploaded by users are securely stored and retrieved with proper permissions enforced by Supabase storage policies.

steps.description: Upload an avatar image as an authenticated user.
Verify the image is stored in Supabase storage and accessible only to authorized users.
Attempt to retrieve or modify another user's avatar without proper authorization.
Verify access is denied and any modifications are blocked.

title: Task Completion Edge Case: Multiple Skills Linked
description: Verify that when a task linked to multiple skills is completed, all linked skills receive appropriate XP.

steps.description: Create a task linked with multiple skills.
Complete the task.
Verify XP is correctly awarded to each linked skill.

title: Handling Scheduling Conflicts in Time Windows
description: Verify the system prevents scheduling overlapping tasks in the same time window and properly alerts the user.

steps.description: Attempt to drag and drop a task into a time window already occupied by another task.
Verify the system prevents scheduling this task and provides an appropriate message or UX feedback.

title: Sign-out Flow and Post Sign-out Access Restriction
description: Verify users can sign out and after sign-out, protected pages redirect them to the authentication screen.

steps.description: Login, then use the sign-out option.
Verify the user is redirected to the authentication page.
Attempt to access a protected route after sign-out.
Verify the user is redirected back to the authentication page.

title: UI Responsiveness on Mobile Devices
description: Verify that all main UI components including navigation bars, dashboards, and scheduling work correctly and are usable on various mobile screen sizes.

steps.description: Access the application with different mobile device screen sizes or emulators.
Verify UI components resize correctly and remain fully functional, including sidebar, bottom navigation, and drag-and-drop scheduling.
